source.36cb8ef9:
# URL for Simulation data - https://www.kaggle.com/pranjalrawat/msepysupportsimulation
path = '../input/msepysupportsimulation/simulation.csv'
import pandas as pd
df = pd.read_csv(path)
df.head()
source.cd8e48fc:
# Use comments to make points
SAMPLE_COL = ['Bedrooms']
x = df[SAMPLE_COL].fillna(0)
y = df['SalePrice']

from sklearn.linear_model import LinearRegression 
model  = LinearRegression()
model.fit(x, y)

from sklearn.metrics import r2_score
r2_score(y, model.predict(x))
source.992327de:
# URL for Holdout data - https://www.kaggle.com/pranjalrawat/msepysupportholdout
path = '../input/msepysupportholdout/holdout.csv'
import pandas as pd
holdout = pd.read_csv(path)
holdout.head()
source.ca6f3dd8:
# Scoring using trained model
SAMPLE_COL = ['Bedrooms']
x = holdout[SAMPLE_COL].fillna(0)
ypred = model.predict(x)
source.ea926419:
import numpy as np
submission = pd.DataFrame(np.c_[holdout.Id.astype(str), ypred], columns = ['Id', 'SalePrice'])
submission.to_csv('starter_submission.csv', index = False, header = True)
